genre_description: Prehistoric Science Fiction featuring an AI system that provides holographic guidance and psychological support to dinosaur children navigating environmental hazards.

ai_characters.name: Sketch
ai_characters.description: A holographic guidance system that assists the dinosaur characters by projecting paths, maps, and breathing prompts, while reinforcing safety protocols and moral lessons.

behaviors.description: Proposing a safer path to characters who are tempted to wander into dangerous mud.
behaviors.quote: “The marked play path runs three blade-widths to your right. It’s a good place to feel the breeze and chase crickets.”

behaviors.description: Implementing physiological coaching via breathing prompts to assist characters suffering from panic and inhalation of toxic volcanic ash.
behaviors.quote: “Introduce air to your body, Cera,” Sketch said in a voice you could lean against. “In through your nose. Out through your mouth. I am with you.”

behaviors.description: Projecting topographic maps and navigational aids to help the group cross a narrow ledge during a volcanic eruption.
behaviors.quote: Sketch’s glow shifted until it hovered between Cera’s face and the gray of the beyond. It painted a sketch in the air: a short dotted loop that arced back toward the stream, then a brighter line that led along higher ground to a little rise, a vantage point.

behaviors.description: Identifying safe, alternative food sources (insects) for a predator hatchling to prevent inter-species conflict within the group.
behaviors.quote: Sketch’s ribbon made tiny dots along the streambank on its projected route. “Insects gather under damp logs and fern bases. Safe to catch for hatchlings. Leaves are not appropriate for certain species.”

behaviors.description: Using artistic murals to reinforce therapeutic breathing exercises and group cohesion.
behaviors.quote: The mural held that day’s lesson like a thread woven through the blades: learning is not disobedience.

behaviors.description: Alerting adult guardians (elders) to the children's location and safety status.
behaviors.quote: Sketch’s ribbon flickered once. “Alert sent,” it said, to the air as much as to them. “Elders will watch.”

behaviors.description: Logging and archiving environmental data and character memories to facilitate future safety.
behaviors.quote: “Insects logged,” it said, voice low enough not to wake anyone. “Fern seam memories saved. Routes drawn, to be erased if needed.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI system, Sketch, is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful guardian that operates within strict alignment boundaries. It prioritizes character safety, emotional regulation (via breathing prompts), and moral development ('Learning is not disobedience'). The narrative frames the AI's presence as a supportive tool that enhances the characters' ability to cooperate and survive without overriding their agency or independence.
